text: Preobrazhenovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Nikolayevsky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 383 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 18 km from Sterlitamak, 12 km from Nikolayevka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Preobrazhenovka, Republic of Bashkortostan
